mapper.insert: insert into tab_gateway_route(route_id, uri, predicates, filters, route_order,enabled,update_time,temp_id) values (#{id}, #{uri}, #{predicates}, #{filters}, #{order},#{enabled},#{updateTime},#{tempId})
mapper.update: update tab_gateway_route set uri=#{uri}, predicates=#{predicates}, filters=#{filters}, route_order=#{order}, update_time=#{updateTime} where route_id = #{id}
mapper.select: select route_id AS "id", uri AS "uri", predicates AS "predicates", filters AS "filters", route_order AS "order", enabled AS "enabled", update_time AS "updateTime", temp_id AS "temp_id" from tab_gateway_route where route_id = #{id}
select t_id AS "tid", name AS "name", uri AS "uri", predicates AS "predicates", filters AS "filters", t_order AS "order" from tab_gateway_template
select username AS "userName", password AS "password" from tab_gateway_user where username = #{userName}
